name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Medium Filter â€” Read without distractions

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
With a single click of a switch you can remove blocks of unwanted content from Medium.com.

* Staff Picks
* Recommended Topics
* Who to Follow
* Recommend from Medium
* "For You""
* Member-Only

The pop-up window can now be run in dark mode.

If you're missing features, feel free to contact me so we can improve the app.

Happy Filtering!
